name: Hauntsfield
description:
Oh no!  Someone has stolen all the pumpkins from your farm, and the Hauntsfield festival is tomorrow!

Get to know the residents of Hauntsfield and its outskirts, and hopefully get your pumpkins back in time to save the festival...

Hauntsfield is a short and sweet Halloween RPG designed for Game Boy.

Play time is 20-30 minutes. Hauntsfield has spooky themes, but is not scary and is appropriate for all ages.

The game can be played in your browser or on most smartphones by clicking "Run Game" above, and can also be played on a real GB flash cart or GB emulator by downloading the .gb file below.

CONTROLS: 

Move - arrow keys or wasd   
A - z or alt     
B - x or ctrl 
Start - enter key

CREDITS:

Story + Code + Art by Allie

Music assets by VictorValdez

Special thanks to Pixel Pete for tutorials & additional assets

This game is free to play! If you enjoyed it, please consider supporting my continued game dev work on Ko-fi or Patreon!
